summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6060 for the improvement of West Webster Street from 12th Avenue Southwest to 18th Avenue Southwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 82878, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
